programme.title: Dredd (2012)
programme.desc: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

programme.title: Spaceballs (1987)
programme.desc: A star pilot and his sidekick must come to the rescue of a Princess and save the galaxy from a ruthless race of beings known as Spaceballs.

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph (2012)
programme.desc: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

programme.title: Judgment Night (1993)
programme.desc: Four friends on their way to a boxing match get caught in heavy traffic, so they take a shortcut in order to get there faster, unfortunately it leads to them witnessing a murder which leaves them running for their lives.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift (2006)
programme.desc: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

programme.title: Clerks (1994)
programme.desc: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

programme.title: Blind Date :
programme.desc: In the age of social media where dating apps thrive on a swipe left or right, hopeful singles looking to form a true connection, take the ultimate plunge when they embark on a blind date.(n)

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New York City : Jesus, the Countess and Joseph
programme.desc: The show must go on for Luann, who performs in her Christmas cabaret despite being snubbed by the ladies for Ramona's surprise party for Dorinda and Sonja. Tinsley is accused of lying to the ladies about her relationship with Scott.(n)

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight Canada :
programme.desc: Covers breaking news stories, upcoming film and television projects, and one-on-one interviews with Hollywood celebrities.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada : More Is More
programme.desc: Eleni's on the hunt for two dresses for her wedding. Cherie wants a big ball gown for her king and queen themed wedding inside a castle.(n)

programme.title: Love It or List It : The Hung Family
programme.desc: The Hung's house needs a formidable facelift. Daughter Laurie wants to pay to renovate the home while her mother just wants to go. Hilary tries to reclaim the love with her reno while David digs deep to deliver a new and exciting family home.(n)

programme.title: First Dates Canada : Say My Name
programme.desc: A restaurant filled with people on first dates is monitored with hidden cameras.(n)

programme.title: First Dates Canada : The Food of Love
programme.desc: A restaurant filled with people on first dates is monitored with hidden cameras.(n)

programme.title: First Dates Canada : Romy and Rangolie
programme.desc: After a bad start to their date, salesman Romy has his work cut out to win over blonde bombshell Rangolie.(n)

programme.title: First Dates Canada : Matty and Jeff
programme.desc: Now that 29-year-old Matty has decided he's solely into men, it's time to see if Jeff will be his Prince Charming.(n)

programme.title: Love It or List It : The Renton Family
programme.desc: Mike and Teresa live in a 90-year-old charming home by the lake that is lovely on the outside, but lacking on the inside. Mike does not want to cut the ties to his East Coast-flavoured home, but Teresa is fed up with its problems.(n)

programme.title: Love It or List It : Mark and Alana
programme.desc: When a young couple invites a parent to join them in their fixer-upper, they need Hilary and David to work their magic immediately. This is the ultimate race against time to create a residential renaissance that can please the entire family.(n)

programme.title: Love It or List It : The Olmstead Family
programme.desc: The Olmsteads live in the second floor apartment of their century fixer upper but plans to reform this residence went astray when their baby arrived. Hilary and David aim to bring this couple together in a house that's right for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: Love It or List It : Kasia and Patrick
programme.desc: With their first child on the way, two young artists decide their frozen second floor has got to go. With huge hopes but tiny budgets, Hilary and David duke it out to find this family some long sought-after peace of mind.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada : More Is More
programme.desc: Eleni's on the hunt for two dresses for her wedding. Cherie wants a big ball gown for her king and queen themed wedding inside a castle.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Canada : Generations Expectations
programme.desc: When three generations weigh in on finding the perfect dress, it means triple the opinions and triple the challenge! Marcie, with the help of her daughter and mom, is on the hunt for the perfect $10,000 ball gown.(n)
